channel.title: Glassfish on Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Glassfish on Documentation

item.title: Glassfish Tunning
item.description: While Installing Glassfish server may seems easy, sometimes you may face lots of issue due to glassfish server not being finely tunned. By default configuration, glassfish server comes with the minimal optipons configured. Here let's discuss about tunning the glassfish server for your environment. Let's first disscuss about the JVM options. bin/asadmin –port list-jvm-options a. List all the JVM Options configured for domain bin/asadmin --port <admin-port> list-jvm-options b. From above command you will get a list of JVM options.
